Ice::

"I have a feeling we are the next step, as it were. Like all life 
that evolves. We are the next phase up in life. We are better than 
Maximals and predacons. We will survive as they die out." She 
smiled. "Think of it. We, you,me and Lunarpine will live and thrive 
here. We will be the hunters instead of the hunted. We can live and 
be in peace."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> "So you're trying to say that we're freaks?" Razor Claw liked that 
> even less than being a rogue, the rogues were hunted by the 
factions, 
> the freaks were hunted by everybody. "Predacons were designed to 
> conquer, Maximals were designed to explore, why were we created?"
>
